8 template <typename K, typename V, typename TACTIC = strTactic>
9 class tnmap : public tnbicontainer<K, V> {
10 typedef tnbicontainer<K, V> _super_;
11 NAMU(CLASS(tnmap, _super_))
12
13 public:
14 template <typename K1, typename V1> friend class tmap;
15 typedef tstr<V, TACTIC> wrap;
16 typedef std::multimap<K, wrap> cmap;
17 typedef typename cmap::iterator citer;
18 typedef std::pair<K, V> cpair;
19 typedef typename super::iter iter;
20 typedef typename super::iteration iteration;
21 friend class nmapIteration;
22#include "../iter/nmapIteration.hpp"
23
24 public:
25 tnmap() {}
26
27 // len:
28 ncnt len() const override;
29
30 // has:
31 nbool has(const K& key) const override;
32
33 // get:
34 using super::get;
35 V& get(const K& key) override;
36
37 // add:
38 using super::add;
39 nbool add(const K& key, const V& new1) override;
40
41 // del:
42 using super::del;
43 nbool del(const K& it) override;
44 nbool del(const iter& at) override;
45 nbool del(const iter& from, const iter& end) override;
46
47 // etc:
48 void rel() override;
49
50 me* deepClone() const override;
51
52 protected:
53 iteration* _onMakeIteration(ncnt step) const override {
54 me* unconst = const_cast<me*>(this);
55 iteration* ret = new nmapIteration(*unconst, unconst->_map.begin(), unconst->_map.end());
56 ret->next(step);
57 return ret;
58 }
59 iteration* _onMakeIteration(const K& key) const override {
60 me* unconst = const_cast<me*>(this);
61 return new nmapIteration(*unconst, unconst->_map.lower_bound(key), unconst->_map.upper_bound(key));
62 }
63
64 void _getAll(const K& key, narr& tray) const override;
65
66 private:
67 nmapIteration& _getIterationFrom(const iter& it) {
68 if(nul(it)) return nulOf<nmapIteration>();
69 if(!it.isFrom(*this)) return nulOf<nmapIteration>();
70 return (nmapIteration&) *it._step;
71 }
72
73 private:
74 cmap _map;
75 };
